title: Selective sensing of cyanide ions: impact of molecular design and assembly on the response of π-conjugated acylhydrazone compounds
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25108-25114
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01884B, Paper

Harshal V. Barkale, Nilanjan Dey
The study elucidated the distinct behavior of compounds 1 and 2 in response to various anions in CH3CN–water (7 : 3) medium. Both compounds exhibited color-changing response towards cyanide ions, leading to ratiometric change in absorption signal.
